attributes.action: ENABLEING THE UNSKILLED UNEMPLOYD TO GET EMPLOYMENT AND TRAINING
attributes.additional_details: we the undersigned wish that that parliament seek to get an agreement that will allow employers to pay unskilled workers a lower basic wage while the employer is having to provide training at the start of a workers employment to bring the workers up to the required skill level for the job instead of having to pay the full national basic wage straight away thus making jobs and training more readily available to the unemployed
